tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Presentations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    presentation_file BYTEA,
    presenter_name VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CourseMaterials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    material_type VARCHAR(50),
    material_content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);
